descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://image.noelshack.com/fichiers/2014/07/1392297179-bannirenexus.png[/img][/center]

This is a building without NPC or anything to do in it. I created this hoping that a modder would like to finish it by adding vendors, citizens, quests, etc. The only thing I added are waypoints and a horseman.

You have the permission to edit whatever you need on this Mod. Have fun.

You will find the location of the cave with [url=http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/51067-4-1392295270.jpg]this link[/url]. If you want to go faster, you can also use the "coc pirate" command in the console to teleport yourself to the location.

[center][youtube]ZoG3QwIge4s[/youtube][/center]

[b]Installation :[/b]
Use NMM and set the load order of "Pirate's Cave - JohnAzerty.esp" at the bottom (or at least after your mods that edit terrain, textures, etc such as Grass Field or it will move a few rocks/floors from my mod).

[b]Mods used in the video/screenshots :[/b]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3288/?]Lush Trees and Grass by SparrowPrince[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50875/?]Grass Field by tamu75[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/23812]Seasons of Skyrim ENB True HDR by Bronze316[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13268/?]WATER - Water And Terrain Enhancement Redux by SparrowPrince[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28950/?]Green Grass for ENB by emd[/url]

PS : there are still one empty boat and one empty house. An update might be coming soon but it will take time.
I wanted to make this mod a Pirate mod, but I didn't have the qualifications to add palm trees, and more pirates items. If you want to use this feel free to give it another name/atmosphere.
author: JohnAzerty
